name: Friender
body: A full stack social media site focused on finding friends based on your hobby.

name: Find Your Next Pet
body: A site built using HandlebarsJs. It searches for cats or dogs up for adoption via an API run by Purina Pet Foods

name: recycled.gg
body: A static site for a World of Warcraft Guild. The focus was on building a modern, mobile friendly site to look at the guild members while learning Material UI

name: Custom Post Type WordPress Plugin
body: A Wordpress plugin that will call an API and present the data that is returned to be viewed and edited. Built using php.

name: Markdown Generator
body: A node.js application using inquirer to build a README for a repository.

name: DiscCover
body: A basic website that uses the Shazam Music API and Youtube API to find similar artists to the searched song or artist. Built using JQuery.

name: Social Network API
body: A backend project using MongoDB and Mongoose. An API that has users who can post "thoughts", and have other users respond to the thoughts with responses. Allows for users to add friends as well.

name: Regex URL Tutorial
body: A tutorial covering regular expressions for URLs. Outlines an expression that allows for the inclusion/exclusion of portions of a url, such as "http".

name: Employee Tracker
body: A backend application based on nodejs and SQL that allows for manipulation of employees' job information within a company.
